not to sit in the front seat of any motor vehicle;Residence - live and sleep each night at at any address as directed by the Youth Offending Team</BailConditions></PersonDefendant><BailStatus>B</BailStatus><Address><SimpleAddress><AddressLine1>ADDRESS_LINE_1</AddressLine1><AddressLine2>ADDRESS_LINE_2</AddressLine2><AddressLine3>ADDRESS_LINE_3</AddressLine3><AddressLine5>ADDRESS_LINE_5</AddressLine5></SimpleAddress></Address><PresentAtHearing>Y</PresentAtHearing><ReasonForBailConditionsOrCustody>To ensure appearance, To prevent offending</ReasonForBailConditionsOrCustody></CourtIndividualDefendant><Offence><BaseOffenceDetails><OffenceSequenceNumber>001</OffenceSequenceNumber><OffenceCode>RT88333</OffenceCode><OffenceWording>On the DATE_OF_HEARING at ADDRESS_LINE_3 in the county of ADDRESS_LINE_4 drove a motor vehicle namely Mini Vehicle Registration Number SUP3R F8ST on a road namely ADDRESS_LINE_2 while disqualified from holding or obtaining a driving licence.</OffenceWording><OffenceTiming><OffenceDateCode>1</OffenceDateCode><OffenceStart><OffenceDateStartDate>2024-04-03</OffenceDateStartDate></OffenceStart></OffenceTiming><ChargeDate>2024-04-12</ChargeDate><ArrestDate>2024-04-12</ArrestDate><LocationOfOffence>OFFENCE_LOCATION</LocationOfOffence></BaseOffenceDetails><InitiatedDate>2024-04-03</InitiatedDate><Plea>2</Plea><ModeOfTrial>1</ModeOfTrial><FinalDisposalIndicator>N</FinalDisposalIndicator><Result><ResultCode>4027</ResultCode><ResultText>RC - Remanded on conditional bail Remanded on conditional bail until hearing on DATE_OF_HEARING at 14:00 in Courtroom 01, ADDRESS_LINE_4 Magistrates' Court. Adjournment reason: For the trial to take place, To attend or a warrant to issue. Conditions: Residence - live and sleep each night at at any address as directed by the Youth Offending Team, Exclusion - not to sit in the front seat of any motor vehicle. Reasons: To ensure appearance, To prevent offending. Defendant to attend the next hearing</ResultText><ResultCodeQualifier>GE</ResultCodeQualifier><ResultCodeQualifier>GC</ResultCodeQualifier><ResultCodeQualifier>RD</ResultCodeQualifier><ResultCodeQualifier>RB</ResultCodeQualifier><NextHearing><NextHearingDetails><CourtHearingLocation>COURT_LOCATION</CourtHearingLocation><DateOfHearing>DATE_OF_HEARING</DateOfHearing><TimeOfHearing>13:00:00</TimeOfHearing></NextHearingDetails><NextHearingReason>For the trial to take place To attend or a warrant to issue</NextHearingReason><BailStatusOffence>B</BailStatusOffence></NextHearing></Result></Offence><Offence><BaseOffenceDetails><OffenceSequenceNumber>002</OffenceSequenceNumber><OffenceCode>RA88001</OffenceCode><OffenceWording>On the DATE_OF_HEARING at ADDRESS_LINE_3 used a motor vehicle, namely Mini Vehicle Registration Number SUP3R F8ST, on a road, or other public place, namely ADDRESS_LINE_2, when there was not in force in relation to that use such a policy of insurance as complied with the requirements of Part VI of the Road Traffic Act 1988.</OffenceWording><OffenceTiming><OffenceDateCode>1</OffenceDateCode><OffenceStart><OffenceDateStartDate>2024-04-03</OffenceDateStartDate></OffenceStart></OffenceTiming></BaseOffenceDetails><InitiatedDate>2024-04-03</InitiatedDate><Plea>2</Plea><ModeOfTrial>1</ModeOfTrial><FinalDisposalIndicator>N</FinalDisposalIndicator><Result><ResultCode>4027</ResultCode><ResultText>RC - Remanded on conditional bail Remanded on conditional bail until hearing on DATE_OF_HEARING at 14:00 in Courtroom 01, ADDRESS_LINE_4 Magistrates' Court. Adjournment reason: For the trial to take place, To attend or a warrant to issue. Conditions: Residence - live and sleep each night at at any address as directed by the Youth Offending Team, Exclusion - not to sit in the front seat of any motor vehicle. Reasons: To ensure appearance, To prevent offending.
